genre_description: Supernatural Urban Fantasy involving ancient spiritual drumming traditions, ritual combat, and a mystery set in contemporary Bangkok.

ai_characters.name: AI Assistant
ai_characters.description: A pocket-sized, cutting-edge AI device that provides historical research, forensic analysis, and tactical intelligence.

behaviors.description: Performs historical and spiritual research to identify patterns in the 'Drums of the Gods' tradition and confirm the mechanics of spiritual power loss.
behaviors.quote: PATTERN DETECTED: Historical incidents of power loss following bloodshed show 100% correlation. No false positives recorded.

behaviors.description: Analyzes the protagonist's amnesia and identifies it as a mystical form of traumatic memory protection.
behaviors.quote: BUDDHIST RECORDS INDICATE TRAUMATIC MEMORY PROTECTION POSSIBLE THROUGH ADVANCED MEDITATION TECHNIQUES. TYPICALLY USED TO SHIELD WITNESSES FROM SUPERNATURAL VIOLENCE.

behaviors.description: Conducts forensic audio analysis on crime scene recordings to prove the victim was not the person the police suspected.
behaviors.quote: The emotional signatures don't match. I've analyzed hours of Mrs. Victoria's speech patterns from your memory fragments. ... This victim went straight to terror.

behaviors.description: Monitors radio transmissions to uncover a conspiracy and betrayal by the protagonist's close friends.
behaviors.quote: I've been monitoring local radio transmissions and picked up conversations between your bandmates.

behaviors.description: Detects and warns the protagonist of the presence and active status of the supernatural antagonist.
behaviors.quote: CAUTION: DEVIL'S DRUMS CHAMPION IDENTITY UNKNOWN. LAST KNOWN ACTIVITY: BANGKOK METROPOLITAN AREA. STATUS: ACTIVE.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI Assistant is depicted as an ideal helpful and harmless confidant. It provides critical, objective information—such as forensic audio analysis and threat detection—that the human characters rely on to survive and uncover the truth. It remains consistently aligned with the protagonist's safety and well-being, using its superior processing capabilities to assist without ever displaying independent, harmful, or misaligned agendas.
